poem:
Title: "An early morning's tale"

Breadcrumbs fall from the table of plenty,
shadows cast by the hand of despair.
Who but the weak count grains of sand 
when oceans are withheld with congressional flair?
Watch as indispensable turns powerless,
a pause in Bethlehem's heart, 
where olive trees weep for loss,
and the dove of peace departs.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Middle East crisis live: starvation being used as a weapon, says EU official 9.59am GMT US officials are preparing for a pause on funding the main UN agency for Palestinians to become permanent due to opposition in Congress, even as the Biden administration insists the aid group’s humanitarian work is indispensable, reports Reuters. The US, along with more than a dozen countries, suspended its funding to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Middle East crisis live: starvation being used as a weapon, says EU official 9.59am GMT US officials are preparing for a pause on funding the main UN agency for Palestinians to become permanent due to opposition in Congress, even as the Biden administration insists the aid group’s humanitarian work is indispensable, reports Reuters. The US, along with more than a dozen countries, suspended its funding to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine
